## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace at position (0, 0)

- Stone furnace (position (0, 0)) with coal as fuel and currently no ingredients to smelt.

### Wooden chest at position (8.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position (8.5, 0.5)) containing 102 iron plates.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting iron gear wheels
- Ensure you have enough iron plates in your inventory before attempting to craft iron gear wheels. The recipe requires 1 iron plate per iron gear wheel, and you need a crafting machine or furnace to produce iron plates.

### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
- Ensure that the target entity (e.g., furnace) has available space before attempting to insert items. The error indicates that the inventory is full, which prevents the insertion of additional items.

### Repeated errors during the same steps
- The errors related to crafting iron gear wheels and inserting iron plates into the furnace occurred multiple times. Review the inventory management to avoid running out of necessary items and ensure the target entities can accept the items being inserted.
